title: >>> PRACTICE Makes PERFECT?
body_text:
He who holds the power has the gold
... or at least in the
O.R.P. Knights'
case, the silver.
Those that were a part of the history-making
DODGEBALL 74
, the event one week prior to the first Toms River Tournament, pushed the dreaded bulletballs aside in preparation for the upcoming 52-team melee.
Exactly thirty events later, the "Practice Round" as it was called in late-January triumphantly returns to the hallowed grounds of Wall High School, where two formidible Dover teams battle it out in an all-or-nothing war.
--->> Is it "goodbye" to the bulletballs this time around?
--->> How will the warriors be split into armies?
--->> Will the
Knights
stand as unite or divide in the heat of battle?
--->> Will the brand-spankin' new
DuckTape Mafia
fight with a common purpose or fall to the forces in front?
This 104th dodgeball extravaganza is surely going to rock the house. Whatever the case, the expectations are extremely high as "Dover Taken Over 2" awaits.
body_html:
He who holds the power has the gold ... or at least in the O.R.P. Knights' case, the silver.

Those that were a part of the history-making DODGEBALL 74, the event one week prior to the first Toms River Tournament, pushed the dreaded bulletballs aside in preparation for the upcoming 52-team melee.

Exactly thirty events later, the "Practice Round" as it was called in late-January triumphantly returns to the hallowed grounds of Wall High School, where two formidible Dover teams battle it out in an all-or-nothing war.

--->> Is it "goodbye" to the bulletballs this time around?
--->> How will the warriors be split into armies?
--->> Will the Knights stand as unite or divide in the heat of battle?
--->> Will the brand-spankin' new DuckTape Mafia fight with a common purpose or fall to the forces in front?

This 104th dodgeball extravaganza is surely going to rock the house. Whatever the case, the expectations are extremely high as "Dover Taken Over 2" awaits.
